SELECT a.emailid, c.name, c.email, a.subject, a.senderemployeeid, a.receiveremployeeid, a.sendtime FROM emails a INNER JOIN employees c ON a.SenderEmployeeID=c.EmployeeId WHERE (senderemployeeid=#{param1} AND tcsend=0 AND sendmark=1) OR (receiveremployeeid=#{param1} AND tcreceive=0 AND receivemark=1) ORDER BY a.emailid DESC LIMIT 0,5;

SELECT a.emailid, b.name, b.email, a.subject, a.senderemployeeid, a.receiveremployeeid, a.sendtime FROM emails a INNER JOIN employees b ON a.receiveremployeeid = b.employeeid WHERE a.senderemployeeid = #{param1} AND a.subject LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param2},'%') AND (a.emailsend = 0 OR a.emailsend = 1) AND a.tcsend = 0 AND (a.multiplesend = 0 OR a.emailid IN (SELECT MIN(emailid) FROM emails GROUP BY multiplesend)) ORDER BY a.emailid DESC
